fixes #217

Issue was that Time.before returned incorrect answer when one of
the dates had a timezone specified (zulu time actually).
Parse away the timezone information to compare only the dates.

Signed-off-by: Jonas Kalderstam <jonas@kalderstam.se>

fixes #228

Problem 1 was that triggers were not added on fresh installs, only
during upgrades. Also added trigger for actual deletes.

Second problem was that nothing would update notifications on
deletes. Added an observer for the URI and suitable notifyChange
calls.
